alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 1:59PM CDT until March 31 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL SALINE AND WESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located east of Owensville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Benton... Salem in Saline County... Avilla... Grape... Bland... Crows... Congo... Owensville... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
